# Language / Stack Instructions

Domain-specific coding standards and guidelines for different technologies used in the repository.

| Instruction                                        | Purpose                                                                                                                                           |
| -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Angular](angular.instructions.md)**             | Framework conventions for Angular 18+ with standalone components, dependency injection, reactive patterns, and component lifecycle best practices |
| **[.NET](dotnet.instructions.md)**                 | C# and .NET coding standards covering async/await patterns, dependency injection, LINQ usage, naming conventions, and Azure SDK integration       |
| **[Azure CLI](azure-cli.instructions.md)**         | Bash and PowerShell scripting patterns for Azure resource provisioning, parameterization, error handling, and infrastructure automation workflows |
| **[Documentation](documentation.instructions.md)** | Markdown structure, readability guidelines, code block formatting, and documentation organization for project readmes and technical guides        |
